duties_responsibilities.duty: Draft wills and estate planning documents for clients in New York and New Jersey.
Handle complex NY probate cases and facilitate easy NJ probate procedures.
conduct legal research and provide expertise in wealth counsel matters.
Manage administrative tasks related to estate planning and probate.
Engage in professional communications with clients, courts, county offices, supervisory attorneys, and staff.
Present public and private seminars/webinars related to estate planning and probate matters.

education_certification.credential: Active NY/NJ bar license in good standing
